title_en: Profound Meaning of the Three Treatises
notes: This text does not appear in the Korean canon. A note in the Taisho reads: ＜原＞建長八年藥師寺藏基辨加點本, ＜甲＞元祿十四年刊大谷大學藏本 Source: Yakushi-ji collection version, 8th year of the Kenchō era [1249-1256], 1. Ōtani University canon, published 40th year of the Genroku era [1688-1704].

title_zh: 華嚴經內章門等雜孔目章
華嚴經明法品內立三寶章
修華嚴奧旨妄盡還源觀
註華嚴經題法界觀門頌
教誡新學比丘行護律儀
中天竺舍衛國祇洹寺圖經
根本說一切有部出家授近圓羯磨儀範
根本說一切有部苾芻習學略法

summary: A repentance ritual inspired by Emperor Wu of Liang after seeing his deceased wife in a dream reborn as a snake.
